content.query:
ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_ft_indicadores AS
SELECT 
    COALESCE (t.TIME , h.time , v.time) as fecha_hora,
    COALESCE (t.CodigoNacional, h.CodigoNacional, v.CodigoNacional) as Codigo,
    t.Ts_Valor,
    h.HR_Valor,
    v.dd_Valor,
    v.ff_Valor,
    v.VRB_Valor
FROM dbo.temperatura T 
    FULL JOIN dbo.viento V  
        ON t.time =v.time
        AND t.CodigoNacional = v.CodigoNacional
    FULL JOIN dbo.humedad H 
        ON t.time = h.time
        AND t.CodigoNacional= h.CodigoNacional
GO
